mr.go.sgfilter

Class TrendRemover

  • java.lang.Object
    • mr.go.sgfilter.TrendRemover
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Preprocessor

    public class TrendRemover
extends java.lang.Object
implements Preprocessor
    De-trends data by setting straight line between the first and the last point and subtracting it from data. Having applied filters to data you should reverse detrending by using retrend(double[], double[])
    Author:
    Marcin Rze≈∫nicki
